item.title: Tutorial: How to use it?
item.description: This is the instruction of the template Hugo Introduction Basic Description Hugo is a popular open-source static site generator that allows you to create fast and efficient websites without relying on a database or server-side scripting. The structure of a Hugo site includes the following elements: Content folder: This folder contains all the content of your website, including pages, blog posts, images, and other media. The content is typically written in Markdown, which is a lightweight markup language.
